sentences.en: A buzz of excitement filled the courtroom as the defendant was led in.
sentences.cn: 当被告被带进来的时候，整个法庭的人都激动起来，一片嘈杂。

sentences.en: A buzz went through the crowded courtroom.
sentences.cn: 拥挤的法庭里响起了一片乱哄哄的说话声.

sentences.en: And I'll buzz over to talk some sense into old Ocker.
sentences.cn: 我会不厌其烦地给那个固执己见的澳大利亚老头讲道理。

sentences.en: Elsa and I will buzz on to the Raffles bar.
sentences.cn: 埃尔莎和我继续往前去,到拉福尔旅馆的酒巴.

sentences.en: He got a buzz from creating confrontations.
sentences.cn: 制造冲突让他感到幸灾乐祸。

sentences.en: I told them in no uncertain terms to buzz off.
Now be quiet and buzz off.
Performing still gives him a buzz.
sentences.cn: 表演仍然能让他兴奋不已。

sentences.en: Sex education in schools was the buzz topic.
sentences.cn: 性教育在学校是个热议话题。

sentences.en: Sounds good. That can build a lot of buzz.
sentences.cn: 听起来很棒. 这样可以制造话题.

sentences.en: The flight school was in a buzz, he said.
sentences.cn: 他说, 飞行学校里谣言很多.

sentences.en: The girls fell in love with Dublin on previous visits. They said that what they liked was the buzz about the place.
sentences.cn: 姑娘们在前几次的游览中就爱上了都柏林，她们说她们喜欢这个城市的时尚氛围。

sentences.en: The sheik in particular caused a slight stir and buzz.
sentences.cn: 特别是这位酋长引起了一阵轻微的骚动和嘁嘁喳喳的声音.

sentences.en: There were the crowds, hurrying with the same buzz and energy - yielding enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 路上到处是嘈杂的人流, 他们急急走着,步履中照旧透出充沛的精力和热情.

sentences.en: We'll give him a buzz when we get to Maybury Street.
sentences.cn: 我们到了梅贝里街的时候会给他打电话.

words.tran_cn: 蜂鸣器；嗡嗡作声的东西；信号手
发出嗡嗡声；东奔西忙；暗中散布（buzz的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 嗡嗡声，（短暂的）兴奋，时尚氛围
trans.tran_en: a continuous noise like the sound of a  bee

trans.tran_cn: 发出嗡嗡声，匆忙走动，（想法）翻腾，充满嘈杂的声音，给…打电话，（飞机）低飞掠过
trans.tran_en: to make a continuous sound, like the sound of a bee

trans.tran_cn: 发出嗡嗡声；忙乱，急行；发出嘈杂的谈话声
trans.tran_en: to make a continuous sound, like the sound of a  bee
to make a continuous sound, like the sound of a  bee
